COMMON.CONFIRMATION_CONTINUE: Are you sure you want to continue?

MAIN_PAGE.TEXT_NO_AGENT: No agent state is available, due to no Amazon Connect stream integration.
MAIN_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_SUMMARY: After the conversation ends, or when transferring or starting monitoring, a summary of the conversation will be displayed.

SETTINGS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_BOT_SETTINGS: Define a bot to monitor conversations
SETTINGS_PAGE.CONFIRMATION_DISABLE: Do you want to disable this bot?
SETTINGS_PAGE.CONFIRMATION_ENABLE: Do you want to enable this bot?
SETTINGS_PAGE.CONFIRMATION_DELETE: Do you want to delete this bot?
SETTINGS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_CREATE: Create a bot to monitor conversation content
SETTINGS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_EDIT: Edit the bot to monitor conversation content
SETTINGS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_CHECK_LIST: Please describe the checklist items for the agent's utterances. Refer to the examples below and list the checklist items with numbers at the beginning. Include sample sentences in the format (e.g., May I have your name?). Including examples may improve the accuracy of the checks. Finally, specify whether each numbered item is a mandatory, recommended, or violation item.
